Source file src/github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/odo/cli/env/env_test.go

Documentation: github.com/redhat-developer/odo/pkg/odo/cli/env 

     1  package env
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"reflect"
     5  	"sort"
     6  	"strings"
     7  	"testing"
     8  )
     9  
    10  func TestPrintSupportedParameters(t *testing.T) {
    11  	supportedSetParameters := map[string]string{
    12  		nameParameter:      nameParameterDescription,
    13  		projectParameter:   projectParameterDescription,
    14  		debugportParameter: debugportParameterDescription,
    15  	}
    16  
    17  	wantSetParameters := `Available parameters:
    18    DebugPort: Use this value to set component debug port
    19    Name: Use this value to set component name
    20    Project: Use this value to set component project`
    21  
    22  	supportedUnsetParameters := map[string]string{
    23  		debugportParameter: debugportParameterDescription,
    24  	}
    25  
    26  	wantUnsetParameters := `Available parameters:
    27    DebugPort: Use this value to set component debug port`
    28  
    29  	tests := []struct {
    30  		name                string
    31  		supportedParameters map[string]string
    32  		want                string
    33  	}{
    34  		{
    35  			name:                "Case 1: Test print supported set parameters",
    36  			supportedParameters: supportedSetParameters,
    37  			want:                wantSetParameters,
    38  		},
    39  		{
    40  			name:                "Case 2: Test print supported unset parameters",
    41  			supportedParameters: supportedUnsetParameters,
    42  			want:                wantUnsetParameters,
    43  		},
    44  	}
    45  
    46  	for _, tt := range tests {
    47  		t.Run(tt.name, func(t *testing.T) {
    48  			got := strings.TrimSpace(printSupportedParameters(tt.supportedParameters))
    49  
    50  			gotStrings := strings.Split(got, "\n")
    51  			wantStrings := strings.Split(tt.want, "\n")
    52  
    53  			sort.Strings(gotStrings)
    54  			sort.Strings(wantStrings)
    55  
    56  			if !reflect.DeepEqual(wantStrings, gotStrings) {
    57  				t.Errorf("\nGot: %s\nWant: %s", got, tt.want)
    58  			}
    59  		})
    60  	}
    61  }
    62
